question: What are some correct actions to take to prepare for wildfires?
options: Have several ways to receive alerts. Download your local disaster management app and receive real-time alerts.
Pay attention to air quality alerts.
Wait for wildfire to happen and start preparing
correctAnswer: Have several ways to receive alerts. Download your local disaster management app and receive real-time alerts.
Pay attention to air quality alerts.

question: What are some correct actions to stay safe during a wildifre
options: Gather people and water down the fires.
Pay attention to emergency alerts and notifications for information and instructions.
correctAnswer: Pay attention to emergency alerts and notifications for information and instructions.

question: What are some correct actions to take after a Wildfire?
options: Post the situation on social media.
Avoid hot ash, charred trees, smoldering debris and live embers. The ground may contain heat pockets that can burn you or spark another fire.
When cleaning, wear protective clothing – including a long-sleeved shirt, long pants, work gloves and sturdy thick-soled shoes – during clean-up efforts.
correctAnswer: Avoid hot ash, charred trees, smoldering debris and live embers. The ground may contain heat pockets that can burn you or spark another fire.
When cleaning, wear protective clothing – including a long-sleeved shirt, long pants, work gloves and sturdy thick-soled shoes – during clean-up efforts.
